subject: Football (College)
Sugar Bowl
lead_paragraph: Mississippi defensive lineman Robert Nkemdiche, who was recently charged with marijuana possession after a 15-foot fall at an Atlanta hotel, will not play in the Sugar Bowl against Oklahoma State on Jan. 1.
snippet: Mississippi defensive lineman Robert Nkemdiche, who was recently charged with marijuana possession after a 15-foot fall at an Atlanta hotel, will not play in the Sugar Bowl against Oklahoma State on Jan. 1.
